channel.title: Chairman Alex Schriver
channel.description: Chairman Alex Schriver College Republican National Committee (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: As the elected leader of 250,000 College Republicans on more than 1,800 campuses, I've got one of the best jobs in the country.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: I get to push back against the bastions of liberalism ­ America's colleges and universities.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: Every day, I'm thankful to be employed. Yet, unfortunately, many of my peers are not as lucky.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: Half of my generation didn't get up and go to a job this morning. Many of them, in fact 3 out of 10, graduated this year and moved back in with their parents.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: The fact is: we're young. We're focused. We're driven.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: And we need to be out making our mark on the world. Instead, our generation is having a mark made on us.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: Our country is nearly $16 trillion in debt ­ a burden placed on our generation's back. We're tired of it.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: And we're tired of a President and his cronies in Congress being all-too-willing to kick the nation's fiscal crisis down to our road.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: Governor Mitt Romney has a plan to get America back to work, to rein in our out-of-control spending, and to get our great country back on a sustainable path.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: That plan is just what we need.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: At the end of the day, Barack Obama has failed young Americans.
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: We're out of jobs, we're out of "hope" and we're out of "change."
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver

item.title: Our generation can do better. My generation deserves better. Thank you very much, God bless you!
item.author: Chairman Alex Schriver
